Information about the Portable Library Tools: http://visualstudiogallery.msdn.microsoft.com/b0e0b5e9-e138-410b-ad10-00cb3caf4981

By moving the ViewModel into a Portable Library Tools project I have to compile the ViewModels only one time and I can reuse them for WPF, Silverlight, WP7, (Xbox 360?).
The limitation is, that I have to write my own "MVVM Light Toolkit" for the ViewModels.

Are there any plans to support the Portable Library Tools in the future?
